FuncDef: This command renames a subscriber identification string.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the existing subscriber identification string to be renamed. With implicit subscriber ID generation enabled, the old-sub-ident-string cannot refer to a subscriber ID in an implicitly generated default format.

Specifies the new subscriber identification string name. With implicit subscriber ID generation enabled, the new-sub-ident-string cannot refer to a subscriber ID in an implicitly generated default format.
